effects.display_string: Set: Blade Dance deals 20% increased damage.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Blade Dance and Chaos Strike by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Blade Dance and Chaos Strike have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Winning Streak! persists for 8 sec after being removed by Blade Dance or Chaos Strike.

Entering demon form sacrifices all Winning Streak! stacks to gain 2% critical strike chance per stack consumed. Lasts 15 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Carefully balance the Egg's incubation. While stationary, gain 152 Agility every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while moving. While moving, gain 147 of your highest secondary stat every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while stationary. 

Additional stacks above 20 grant 60% reduced benefit.
Use: Suspend the Egg's incubation state for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a high chance to summon a phantom ethereal, dealing 180,369 Shadow damage to your target and 16,233 Shadow damage to all other enemies caught in its path. 

If the target is below 35% health, this effect summons two additional phantoms at 25% effectiveness.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a high chance to apply Queensbane to your target, dealing 132,580 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
